verbose_text: To assess GR immunoreactivity in Ki67 expressing NSPC, blocking buffer was applied for 60 min before cells were incubated for 1 h at room temperature and then overnight at 4 degreesC with a polyclonal mouse anti-Ki67 (Novocastra, 1:200) and polyclonal rabbit anti-GR (H300 Santa Cruz, 1:200) antibody diluted in Supermix.
